title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 that focus on methods for simultaneous translation

container-title: **"Simultaneous Translation with Neural Machine Translation"** - This article explores the application of neural machine translation (NMT) techniques to simultaneous translation

title: **"Wait-k Strategy for Simultaneous Translation"** - Discusses the wait-k strategy, where the system waits for k words before starting the translation, balancing latency and accuracy
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transducers"** - Examines the use of transducer models for direct speech-to-text translation in real-time
Focuses on methods for translating speech incrementally as it is being spoken
**"Simultaneous Translation with Monotonic Attention"** - Investigates the use of monotonic attention mechanisms in NMT for simultaneous translation
**"Adapting Neural Machine Translation for Simultaneous Translation"** - Discusses various adaptations to standard NMT models to make them suitable for real-time translation
**"Real-Time Neural Machine Translation for Speech"** - Explores the challenges and solutions for implementing real-time NMT for spoken language
**"Simultaneous Translation with Transformer Models"** - Analyzes the application of transformer models to the task of simultaneous translation
Focuses on techniques to reduce latency in NMT systems for real-time applications
**"Online and Simultaneous Translation with Recurrent Neural Networks"** - Looks at the use of RNNs for online and simultaneous translation tasks
**"Adaptive Policies for Simultaneous Translation"** - Discusses adaptive policies that adjust translation strategies based on the context and input
**"Simultaneous Translation with Reinforcement Learning"** - Explores the use of reinforcement learning to optimize simultaneous translation systems
**"Efficient Simultaneous Translation with Dynamic Programming"** - Investigates the application of dynamic programming techniques to improve the efficiency of simultaneous translation
**"Simultaneous Translation with Pre-trained Language Models"** - Examines the use of pre-trained language models like BERT and GPT for real-time translation
**"Real-Time Translation with Sequence-to-Sequence Models"** - Discusses the application of sequence-to-sequence models for real-time translation tasks
**"Simultaneous Translation with Contextual Embeddings"** - Focuses on the use of contextual embeddings to improve the quality of simultaneous translation
**"Neural Simultaneous Translation with Adaptive Segmentation"** - Investigates adaptive segmentation techniques to improve the performance of neural simultaneous translation systems
**"Simultaneous Translation with Multi-Task Learning"** - Explores the use of multi-task learning to enhance simultaneous translation models
**"Real-Time Speech Translation with End-to-End Models"** - Discusses the challenges and solutions for implementing end-to-end models for real-time speech translation
**"Simultaneous Translation with Attention Mechanisms"** - Analyzes the role of attention mechanisms in improving the performance of simultaneous translation systems
